label.intro:
Course Length and Format

 

Average course completion time:  1 hour

You can enhance your learning in this course by doing the following:

  • Gain new knowledge and skills through narrated PowerPoint presentations and reflections.

  • Check your comprehension by completing the unit quizzes.

  • Earn a certificate of completion by viewing all activities in the course (unless marked "optional"), completing all quizzes with a score of at least 75% (7.5 points out of 10 possible), and spending a minimum of 45 minutes in the course (you may do this in smaller chunks of time). Please note that the checkmark for some items may not appear as "viewed" until after this course page is refreshed.
